networked_experiments

Class ClassificationResultHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • networked_experiments.ClassificationResultHandler

  • public class ClassificationResultHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implement the methods that enable classification result upload to OpenML servers.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ClassificationResultHandler(org.openml.apiconnector.io.OpenmlConnector client, java.io.File sourceCodeDir, DataSet originalDset, java.lang.String[] classNames)
      Initialization.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void setUseBenchmarker(boolean useBenchmarker) 
      void uploadClassificationResults(org.openml.apiconnector.xml.Task task, ValidateableInterface classifier, int classifierIndex, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> parameterStringValues, int times, int folds, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer>[][][] foldTrainTestIndexes, float[][][][] allLabelAssignments)
      This method prepares and uploads the classification results to the OpenML servers.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ClassificationResultHandler

        public ClassificationResultHandler(org.openml.apiconnector.io.OpenmlConnector client,
                           java.io.File sourceCodeDir,
                           DataSet originalDset,
                           java.lang.String[] classNames)
        Initialization.
        Parameters:
        client - OpenmlConnector for invoking OpenML API calls.
        sourceCodeDir - File that is the source code directory for the algorithms used in the experiments.
        originalDset - DataSet that is the experiment data.
        classNames - String[] representing the class names, as they should be reported in the upload.

    • Method Detail

      • setUseBenchmarker

        public void setUseBenchmarker(boolean useBenchmarker)
        Parameters:
        useBenchmarker - Boolean flag indicating whether to use the benchmarker or not. It slows down result upload significantly.

      • uploadClassificationResults

        public void uploadClassificationResults(org.openml.apiconnector.xml.Task task,
                               ValidateableInterface classifier,
                               int classifierIndex,
                               java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> parameterStringValues,
                               int times,
                               int folds,
                               java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer>[][][] foldTrainTestIndexes,
                               float[][][][] allLabelAssignments)
                                 throws java.lang.Exception
        This method prepares and uploads the classification results to the OpenML servers.
        Parameters:
        task - Task that is the OpenML task.
        classifier - ValidateableInterface which is the classifier to upload the results for.
        classifierIndex - Integer that is the index of the classifier to upload the results for.
        parameterStringValues - HashMap mapping the parameters of the classification algorithm to their values in the current experiment run.
        times - Integer that is the number of repetitions in CV.
        folds - Integer that is the number of folds in CV.
        foldTrainTestIndexes - ArrayList[][][] representing the train/test splits for all repetitions and folds, as produced by OpenML for the experiment.
        allLabelAssignments - float[][][][] representing all probabilistic label assignments, for each algorithm, repetition and data point.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
